    Analog-to-Digital Converter.
    Author:
    Mr. Mallory

      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int readChannel(int channel)
      Reads an analog voltage from the MCP3008 Module from one of its 8 module [0:7], the max return value is 2^10-1 or 1023.

    • Method Detail

      • readChannel

        public int readChannel(int channel)
        Reads an analog voltage from the MCP3008 Module from one of its 8 module [0:7], the max return value is 2^10-1 or 1023.
        Parameters:
        channel - MCP3008 Analog Source Channel [0:7].
        Returns:
        An analog voltage from the appropriate channel in the range [0:1023].
